channel.title: Sinister Pk New [718] !New Server!
channel.description:
[center]Join Us at www.sinisterpk.com Play Now at www.sinisterpk.com/play.php Download Our Client at www.sinisterpk.com/SinisterPk.jar[/center]
Hey guys! welcome to the advertisement of Sinister Pk! We are a new 718 server that just opened up, and we need new dedicated players. Of course this means that there are no staff, so we need staffs. This server is updated daily, to deliver the best contents! I hope you guys decide to join us in our great adventure!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/0.jpg[/img]
All Skills working
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/13.jpg[/img]
Change Max cape and Comp cape colors
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/12.jpg[/img]
Pk'ing spots
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/11.jpg[/img]
Mini-Games
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/10.png[/img]
Bossing Teleports
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/9.jpg[/img]
Dungeoneering fully working with a shop!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/7.png[/img]
Few of our monster spots
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/6.jpg[/img]
Global Teleports to get around easily
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/5.png[/img]
Players Stat Info
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/4.jpg[/img]
We have clan slayer!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/3.jpg[/img]
This is how you claim your stuff!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/2.jpg[/img]
We also have Daily Tasks!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/1.jpg[/img]
We have Quick Prayers!
Join Us Now!
